modes.connectionModeHint: Connection Mode: Use arrow keys to select target card, ESC to cancel
modes.freeConnectionHint: Free Connection Mode: Click and drag to connect two cards, ESC to cancel

keyboard.title: Customize Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboard.info: Blue items are editable shortcuts, refresh after saving

markdownExport.title: Markdown Export
markdownExport.instruction: The following is the Markdown format content of the mind map, which can be copied to any editor that supports Markdown. Metadata is saved at the end of the document for subsequent import.

mermaidExport.title: Mermaid Code
mermaidExport.instruction: The following code can be used on platforms that support Mermaid, such as GitHub, GitLab, Notion, etc.

mermaidImport.title: Import Mermaid Flowchart
mermaidImport.placeholder: Please enter or paste Mermaid format code...
mermaidImport.pasteHelp: Paste not working? Try the following options:

markdownImport.title: Import Markdown
markdownImport.instruction: Please enter or upload a Markdown file. Two import modes are supported:
markdownImport.mode1: Markdown with metadata: Fully restore all information of the mind map
markdownImport.mode2: Plain Markdown: Create independent cards based on separators or paragraphs
markdownImport.placeholder: Please paste Markdown content or use the button below to upload a file...

clipboard.copyFailed: Copy failed, please select and copy manually

export.pngFailed: Export failed: Canvas reference not found

import.mermaidFailed: Import failed, please check Mermaid code format
import.markdownFailed: Import failed: Unable to parse Markdown content

algorithms.randomDesc: Cards are randomly distributed within the current view range, automatically avoiding overlap

placeholders.model: Leave empty to use default model

messages.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear AI configuration? This will delete all saved settings.

expand.title: Expand Ideas
expand.description: Based on cards in current viewport, AI will generate related new ideas and expanded content

organize.title: Organize & Refine
organize.description: AI will organize and refine cards in current viewport, removing redundancy and extracting key points

draft.title: Export Draft
draft.description: AI will generate a structured draft article based on cards in current viewport
draft.logicDraftDescription: Generate draft based on mind map logic structure

logicOrganization.title: Logic Organization
logicOrganization.description: AI will analyze the mind map structure in current viewport, reorganize logical relationships and optimize layout

functionConfig.taskDescriptionHint: This is the instruction description used when AI performs tasks, you can modify it as needed
functionConfig.expansionDescriptionPlaceholder: Please expand creatively based on existing content and generate related new ideas and sub-topics
functionConfig.organizationDescriptionPlaceholder: Please organize and refine the content, extracting key points
functionConfig.draftDescriptionPlaceholder: Please generate a structured draft article based on the following card content
functionConfig.logicOrganizationDescriptionPlaceholder: Please organize the following mind map logically, optimizing structure and connections
functionConfig.logicDraftDescriptionPlaceholder: Please generate a structured draft article based on the logical structure of the following mind map
functionConfig.expansionTemperatureHint: Higher temperature values will produce more creative and diverse expanded content
functionConfig.organizationTemperatureHint: Lower temperature values will produce more accurate and consistent organization results
functionConfig.draftTemperatureHint: Medium temperature values balance creativity and accuracy, suitable for generating structured articles
functionConfig.logicOrganizationTemperatureHint: Medium-low temperature values ensure accuracy and consistency in logic organization
functionConfig.logicDraftTemperatureHint: Medium temperature values balance logic and creativity, suitable for generating articles based on diagrams
functionConfig.maxTokensHint: Controls the maximum length of AI response, higher values allow more detailed output
functionConfig.openConfigBeforeExecutionHint: When enabled, clicking expand ideas or organize will open the config interface first for easy parameter adjustment

messages.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset current function to default configuration?
